stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to
Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.)
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill

movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

name: Staff Exp. 3
description:
While unit lives, all staff allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

name: Dagger Exp. 3
description:
While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

name: Spd/Res Gap 3
description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+5 to ally
with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

name: Rouse Def/Res 3
description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Def/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

name: Atk/Def Oath 3
description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn.

name: Breath of Life 3
description:
If unit initiates combat, restores 7 HP to adjacent
allies after combat.

name: Savage Blow 3
description:
If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foes
within 2 spaces of target after combat.

name: Spur Atk 3
description: Grants Atk+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Spur Spd 3
description: Grants Spd+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Spur Def 3
description: Grants Def+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Spur Res 3
description: Grants Res+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Goad Armor
description:
Grants Atk/Spd+4 to armored allies within
2 spaces during combat.

name: Ward Armor
description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to armored allies within
2 spaces during combat.

name: Goad Cavalry
description:
Grants Atk/Spd+4 to cavalry allies within 2 spaces
during combat.

name: Ward Cavalry
description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to cavalry allies within 2 spaces
during combat.

name: Goad Fliers
description:
Grants Atk/Spd+4 to flying allies within 2 spaces
during combat.

name: Ward Fliers
description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to flying allies within 2 spaces
during combat.

name: Hone Atk 3
description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

name: Hone Spd 3
description:
At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

name: Fortify Def 3
description:

1 turn.

name: Fortify Res 3
description:

1 turn.

name: Hone Armor
description:

name: Fortify Armor
description:

name: Hone Cavalry
description:

name: Fortify Cavalry
description:

description:

name: Fortify Fliers
description:

name: Threaten Atk 3
description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Threaten Spd 3
description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Threaten Def 3
description:
At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Threaten Res 3
description:
At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Embla's Ward
description: Reduces damage dealt to unit to 0.

name: Quickened Pulse
description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-1.

name: Phantom Spd 1
description:
If a skill compares unit’s Spd to a foe’s or ally's
Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +5.

name: Squad Ace A 1
description: Grants HP+3.

name: Hardy Bearing 1
description:
Disables unit's skills that change attack priority. At
start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, disables foe's
skills that change attack priority.

name: Phantom Spd 3
description:
If a skill compares unit’s Spd to a foe’s or ally's
Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +10.

name: Hardy Bearing 2
description:
Disables unit's skills that change attack priority. At
start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, disables foe's
skills that change attack priority.

name: Hardy Bearing 3
description:
Disables unit's and foe's skills that change attack
priority.

name: Deflect Melee 1
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses a
sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's
second attack onward by 30%.

name: Deflect Melee 2
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
a sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's
second attack onward by 50%.

name: Deflect Melee 3
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses a
sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's
second attack onward by 80%.

name: Deflect Missile 1
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second
attack onward by 30%.

name: Deflect Missile 2
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second
attack onward by 50%.

name: Deflect Missile 3
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second
attack onward by 80%.

name: Deflect Magic 1
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack
onward by 30%.

name: Deflect Magic 2
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack
onward by 50%.

name: Deflect Magic 3
description:
If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses
magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack
onward by 80%.

name: Elixir Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and an【Elixir】drops.

【Elixir】
Restores 99 HP to all allies

name: Horn Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Fortifying Horn】drops.

【Fortifying Horn】
Grants all allies Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 for 1 turn.

name: Blade Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Special Blade】drops.

【Special Blade】
Enables use of Specials for all allies.

name: Boots Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and【Infantry Boots】drop.

【Infantry Boots】
Grants +1 to movement to all allies for 1 turn.

name: Veil Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Dancer's Veil】drops.

【Dancer's Veil】
Allows one random ally that has already acted
to take another action.

name: Charm Seal
description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Lightning Charm】drops.

【Lightning Charm】
Inflicts 20 damage to all enemies.

name: Guardian Seal
description:
Units on the opposing team with Range = 2
cannot move through a space adjacent to the
holder of this seal. (Does not affect units with
Pass.) When foe with this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeated foe and
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat.

name: Røkkr
description:
Neutralizes damage outside of combat (from
skills like Poison Strike, etc.) except damage
dealt by Specials that trigger before combat.
Unit's HP can be reduced to 0 only by an
attack from allied armies. Unit cannot restore
its own HP.
